body.p: This guide provides information necessary to deploy the Dell Red Hat Cloud Solutions with Red Hat Enterprise Linux OpenStack Platform 5, on Dell R620, R720, and R720xd servers with Dell PowerEdge H710 disk controller; and the network with Dell Force10 S4810 and the S55 Switches.

section.title: Intended Audience
section.p: This guide assumes the reader is familiar with:

ul.li: PowerEdge R620 and R720xd RAID and BIOS configuration
